Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: datruthplease
Reviews.Content: this phone gets good reception in a wide range and has good battery life. I docked a point for the slide out qwerty because the left half of it where it shares letter and numbers is not as easy/fast to use as my prior phones. the pressure points should be directly under the letters and not the numbers imo. it slows me down a little when texting.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Dylan
Reviews.Content: Phone is great calling and txting is awesome on this phone camera works well. long lasting battery charge i get about 5 hours if i use every minute. but to use once and a while during the day ur good for the whole day. Mp3 player is nice great speaker. inbox is a little shallow at about a hundred messages it start getting really full and u have to dump it over great phone i love it

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Jodie
Reviews.Content: i like the phone but it was not new and it took me for ever to get it lined out, had the wrong papers with it and then i got it lined out and its working fine so far

Reviews.Title: Love this phone =)
Reviews.Author: LaShaun
Reviews.Content: all i have to say bad about this phone is be careful of which case you buy for it, especially if its a hard one. this is the review i did for the case i bought for it "Really pretty case, however you have to really adjust the top piece a certain way because if you don't then every time you slide it up it'll press one of the side buttons on the phone and that wouldn't bother me so much if it didn't mess up my whole phone system. Like every time i would go to slide my phone it would go to the menu screen and wouldn't let me exit out of it or press any arrow buttons. it works fine now but u just have to adjust the top correctly."

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy this from Essex Technology Group
Reviews.Author: Todd K Bach
Reviews.Content: Do NOT buy this item from Essex Technology Group!!They don't even know what a 'LOCKED CELL PHONE' is.  When you receive the locked cell phone from them, and notify them of that fact.  They will not only require that you pay shipping to return it, but they will not even respond to you about the fact that it is a locked phone.  I even sent them the MEID number of the cell phone they shipped to me, they didn't even know how to research the fact that it is a locked phone.  They are stupid, possibly fraudulent.  THE PHONE COULD EVEN BE A STOLEN ITEM.

ProductInfo.Name: Straight Talk Samsung R455C Slider Cell Phone
